00030 #include "winetricks.h"
00031 
00032 winetricks::winetricks(QString prefixName, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00033 {
00034     core = new CoreMethods();
00035 
00036     this->winetricks_bin.append(QDir::homePath());
00037         this->winetricks_bin.append("/.config/");
00038         this->winetricks_bin.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00039         this->winetricks_bin.append("/winetricks");
00040         
00041     this->prefix_path = core->getPrefixPath(prefixName);
00042     this->console_bin = core->getSettingValue("console", "bin");
00043     this->console_args = core->getSettingValue("console", "args");
00044 
00045     setupUi(this);
00046 
00047     connect (cmdInstall, SIGNAL (clicked()), this, SLOT(run_winetricks()));
00048     connect (cmdExit, SIGNAL (clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00049     connect (cmdInstWinetricks, SIGNAL (clicked()), this, SLOT (install_winetricks()));
00050         connect (cmdHelp, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT (run_help()));
00051 }
00052 
00053 winetricks::~winetricks()
00054 {
00055     delete core;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void winetricks::install_winetricks() {
00059     downloadwinetricks ();
00060 }
00061 
00062 void winetricks::run_winetricks(){
00063         if (!QFile(this->winetricks_bin).exists()){
00064                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("<p>q4wine can't locate winetricks at %1 path!</p><p>The script is maintained and hosted by DanKegel at http://www.kegel.com/wine/winetricks.  You can get it from the commandline with the command:</p><p>wget http://www.kegel.com/wine/winetricks</p><p>Or use \"Install winetricks\" button.</p>").arg(this->winetricks_bin));
00065         return;
00066     }
00067 
00068     QStringList args;
00069     if (!console_args.isEmpty()){
00070         // If we have any conslope parametres, we gona preccess them one by one
00071         QStringList cons_args = console_args.split(" ");
00072         for (int i=0; i<cons_args.count(); i++){
00073             if (!cons_args.at(i).isEmpty())
00074                 args.append(cons_args.at(i));
00075         }
00076     }
00077 
00078     args.append(core->getSettingValue("system", "sh"));
00079     args.append("-c");
00080 
00081     QString arg;
00082         arg.append("WINEPREFIX=");
00083         arg.append(this->prefix_path);
00084         arg.append(" ");
00085         arg.append(this->winetricks_bin);
00086         arg.append(" ");
00087         arg.append(lstMain->currentItem()->text());
00088 
00089     args.append(arg);
00090 
00091     Process *exportProcess = new Process( args, console_bin, QDir::homePath(), tr("Running winetricks..."), tr("Plz wait..."));
00092 
00093     if (exportProcess->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00094         return;
00095     }
00096 
00097     return;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void winetricks::downloadwinetricks () {
00101         /*
00102          * Downloading winetriks and installing it
00103          */
00104 
00105     QStringList args;
00106     if (!console_args.isEmpty()){
00107         // If we have any conslope parametres, we gona preccess them one by one
00108         QStringList cons_args = console_args.split(" ");
00109         for (int i=0; i<cons_args.count(); i++){
00110             if (!cons_args.at(i).isEmpty())
00111                 args.append(cons_args.at(i));
00112         }
00113     }
00114 
00115         args.append(core->getSettingValue("system", "sh"));
00116     args.append("-c");
00117     QString arg;
00118         arg.append(core->getWhichOut("wget"));
00119                 arg.append(" http://kegel.com/wine/winetricks -O ");
00120                 arg.append(this->winetricks_bin);
00121                 arg.append(" && ");
00122                 arg.append(core->getWhichOut("chmod"));
00123                 arg.append(" +x ");
00124                 arg.append(this->winetricks_bin);
00125 
00126     args.append(arg);
00127 
00128     Process *exportProcess = new Process( args, console_bin, QDir::homePath(), tr("Downloading and installing winetricks..."), tr("Plz wait..."));
00129 
00130         exportProcess->exec();
00131         // setting help
00132 
00133 
00134 
00135 }

00154 void winetricks::run_help() {
00155 
00156     winetrickshelp *w = new winetrickshelp();
00157     w->show();
00158 }
